Catalano.Imaging.Tools

Class IntegralImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Tools.IntegralImage

  • public class IntegralImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Integral Image.
    The class implements integral image concept, which is described by Viola and Jones in: P. Viola and M. J. Jones, "Robust real-time face detection", Int. Journal of Computer Vision 57(2), pp. 137â€“154, 2004. An integral image I of an input image G is defined as the image in which the intensity at a pixel position is equal to the sum of the intensities of all the pixels above and to the left of that position in the original image.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int[][] integralImage
      Provides access to internal array keeping integral image data.

                  int y1,
                  int x2,
                  int y2)
        Calculate sum of pixels in the specified rectangle.
        Parameters:
        x1 - Coordinate of left-top rectangle's corner.
        y1 - Coordinate of left-top rectangle's corner.
        x2 - Coordinate of right-bottom rectangle's corner.
        y2 - Coordinate of right-bottom rectangle's corner.
        Returns:
        Returns sum of pixels in the specified rectangle.

      • getRectangleSum

        public int getRectangleSum(int x,
                  int y,
                  int radius)
        Calculate sum of pixels in the specified rectangle.
        Parameters:
        x - Coordinate of central point of the rectangle.
        y - Coordinate of central point of the rectangle.
        radius - Radius of the rectangle.
        Returns:
        Returns sum of pixels in the specified rectangle.

      • getHarrXWavelet

        public int getHarrXWavelet(int x,
                  int y,
                  int radius)
        Calculate horizontal (X) haar wavelet at the specified point.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the point to calculate wavelet at.
        y - Y coordinate of the point to calculate wavelet at.
        radius - Wavelet size to calculate.
        Returns:
        Returns value of the horizontal wavelet at the specified point.
